title: IMD Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 134 Scientific Assistant Posts
description: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 134 Project Scientist I, II, III, E, Scientific Assistant, and Admin Assistant Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, B.E./B. Tech, M.Sc., and M.E./M. Tech can apply for the IMD Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. H...
